title: Angular is the best SPA framework
body: Angular is amazing if your app needs to manage complex forms

title: GraphQL, an alternative to REST
body: GraphQL is a new way to query data

title: Java Records
body: Records are immutable data classes that require only the type and name of fields

title: RxJs hot vs cold observables
body: A cold observable creates a data producer for each subscriber, whereas a hot observable creates a data producer first, and each subscriber gets the data from one producer, starting from the moment of subscription
